24b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ badz+ra d+ha tu dr-i sh+ya zhes bya ba la sogs pas thams cad blta bar byas la/ dzaHb+hu baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM a haM zhes bya ba dang / dpal rnam 
24b7(rgyud 'grel): par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i snying po dang / sngags lan gsum brjod la/ chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis kyang / de rnams la rgyas btab ste/ dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams 
24b8(rgyud 'grel): kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dbang ba glu ra la/ mchod yon phul nas mchod par bya ste/ oM sarba ta tha ga ta puSh+pa pu dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes bya ba dang / me tog gis so// 
25a1(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa ma dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes bya ba dang dris so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes bya ba dang bdug pas so// oM 
25a2(rgyud 'grel): a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NaM A d+ya nuta pa ni na tAta/ ces bya ba dang bshos kyis so// oM sarba ta thA ga tid+da pa pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM zhes bya ba dang mar mes mchod pa bya zhing / sgeg mo la sogs pa 
25a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod la/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma ni r+yA ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma badz+ri aHoM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na kar+m+ma gri dzaHoM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na a na?/ 
25a4(rgyud 'grel): rAg Na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma bA Ne hUM hoHoM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yAtA na swe d+hu ka ra pU dza s+pha ra Na karma tuSh+Ti aHoM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a b+hi She ka rat+ne b+h+yo badz+ra ma Ni au/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sun+yai b+h+yo badz+ra 
25a5(rgyud 'grel): tidza ni dz+wA la d+hI/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta A sha pa ri pU ra Na tsinA ma Ni d+hA dzAM gre b+h+yo badz+ra d+hA dzA gre tAM/ oM na maHsarba tathA ga ta mahA bI ti pra ma d+ya ka re b+h+yo badz+ra hA s+ya hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nug ta badz+ra d+harma tA sa mA 
25a6(rgyud 'grel): d+hi b+hi stu no ma mi hA d+harma gr-i thaiHoM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nir ha ri stu no me mi hA g+ho Sha nu ge d+haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsakra ak+Sha ra pa ri bA ra tA di sarba sU tAn+ta na yai sU no mi sarba maN+Da le hUM/ oM sarba ta 
25a7(rgyud 'grel): thA ga te san+na b+hASha bud+d+ha sang gI ti birbe yaM stu no mi badz+ra bA tse ThA/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pa me g+ha s+pha ra NAM pU dza karme ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puSh+pa pra sa ra s+pho re Na pU dza karme ki ri ki ro/ oM sarba ta thA ga 
25a8(rgyud 'grel): ta.A lo kaM dz+wa la s+pha ra/ mU dze karme ka rakar/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan d+ha sa mu rda s+pha ra Na pU karme ku ru ku ru/ zhes bya bas/ sems dpa' bcu drug dang 'dra ba'i rigs ma las kyi phyag rgya dang ldan 
25b1(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o// de'i phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin te/ rdo rje bsdams pa dkur bzhag ste// btsir ba gnyis su byas pa yis// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ni// bsgyings bcas 
25b2(rgyud 'grel): gsor ba gnyis ka yis// lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang // meda'i 'bang ba yi tshul dang ni// legs so zhes pa snying gar bzhag/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis// snying gar nyi ma brtan/ 
25b3(rgyud 'grel): pabar bya// g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs// de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya// g.yas pa yis ni g.yon par dbye// snying gar g.yon par ral gri mdud// mgal me 'khor lo bskor ba dang / 
25b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gnyis ka kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar bskor dkrol ba yi// thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor gzhag/ go cha mthe'u chung mche ba dang // khu tshur gnyis ni mnan pa'o// de nas phyag bzhi byas la/ dpal rdo rje sems 
25b5(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i phyag rgya chen por gnas te/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko ha zhes bya ba 'dis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bdag nyid bsgom mo// de nas oM swa b+ha ba bi shud d+he haM zhes bya bas 
25b6(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin gyis dag par mos par byas la/ oM sarba sa mo haM zhes bya bas bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i lha thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du bsam par bya'o// de nas dpal rdo rje 
25b7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa rdo rje'i tshig gam yid kyis bzlas la/ thams cad bdag yin no zhes bsgoms la/ lha thams cad kyi zhal nas sngags kyi sgra 'byung bar bsam zhing / bzlas pa la brtson par 
25b8(rgyud 'grel): byas na de lta bus ni/ thams cad kyis bzlas par 'gyur ro// ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgoms la/ skye bar gyur na/ yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod la/ mchod yon phul te// 
26a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod par phyag bzhi byas nas/ phyag rgya gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid las bkrol la/ rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya badz+ra muHzhes bya ba dang dgrol bar bya'o// dpal 
26a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i gnas kyi nges pa ni bshad zin to// mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i gnas ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje las kyi gnas nyid yin 
26a3(rgyud 'grel): no// rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas ni spyi gtsug yin no// rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya snying ga nas byung ba/ rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gnas pa dang / oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa zhes bya 
26a4(rgyud 'grel): bas phyag rgya thams cad dbang bskur bar bya'o// de'i rjes la sarba mu traM mai tre ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na baM zhes bya ba dang / mdzub mo gnyis kyis snga ma bzhin du go cha gos la/ tha mar mnyam pa'i thal mos 
26a5(rgyud 'grel): snga ma bzhin du mnyes par byas la/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang yi ge brgya pa bzlas nas/ mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos te/ bdag gis cho ga ma tshang ba gang 
26a6(rgyud 'grel): dag bgyis pa de bzod par mdzod cig ces gsol ba btab la/ mchod yon phul nas/ oM kr-i to b+ha sarba satwA n+ti sid+d+hi maM dat+tA ya thA nu ga gats+tsha traM bud+d+ha bi Sha yaM/ pu na rA ga ma na ya tsa zhes bya bas sangs 
26a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams gshegs pa'i phyir bskul bar bya zhing / oM badz+ra sar+b+ba muHzhes bya ba'i snying po 'das/ rdo rje sems dpe'i phyag rgya gyen du dgrol bar bya'o// de ltar na
26a8(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyang gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro// de lta ba bzhin du sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams ni/ de bzhin du yid kyis legs pa'i sbyor bas rang gi lus la bcug
26b1(rgyud 'grel): la/ rdo rje bsrung ba dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung ba byas nas langs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi las dang / glegs bam bklag pa la sogs pa bya'o// 
26b2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar nyin re re zhing thun bzhir zla ba gcig gam/ zla ba drug gam/ lo gcig gam/ dus ji srid kyi lha rnams las snang ba thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bya'o// yang na snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po dang 
26b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa la sogs pa byas la/ de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung // chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher// byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla// de nas badz+ra At+ma ko la sogs pa'i snying 
26b4(rgyud 'grel): po gsum bzlas la/ de'i don gsum po rnam par bsgoms nas/ phyag rgya bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la bsrungs pa'i sngags lnga pos rang gi snying gar rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la/ sngar bshad pa'i 
26b5(rgyud 'grel): snying pos dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas zhugs la/ badz+ra At+ma ko la sogs pa'i sngags kyis de rnams dang gcig tu 
26b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur par byas la/ badz+ra d+hA tu ra haM swa yang zhes bya bas/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bdag nyid nges par byas te/ thams cad kyang bdag nyid kho na yin no zhes bsgoms la/ dpal rdo rje 
26b7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa'i snying po 'am/ sngags zlos shing lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang sngags kyi sgra 'byung ba der yang bsam par bya'o// phyogs de lta bu la sogs pas kyang / rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa
26b8(rgyud 'grel): 'grub par 'gyur ro// ngal zhing du ba na mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bstod pa dang / mchod pa phyag bzhi byas la/ thun bzhi'i tha mar yang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bstod pa sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga byas la/ gshegs
27a1(rgyud 'grel): su gsol bar bya'o// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags rnams ni/ rnal 'byor chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin pas/ dkyil 'khor bsgom par mi nus pa gang
27a2(rgyud 'grel): yin pa des ni rnal 'byor chen po byas la/ thams cad kyi sngags re re zhing bzlas brjod 'bum 'bum byas la/ badz+ro k+tiSh+Tha zhes lan 'bum pa blas la/ rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas mtshan thog thag 
27a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlas brjod byas na grub par 'gyur ro// de nas brtsams te bum pa la sogs pa de nam mkha' la 'dzeg par nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje mdzub sor gnyis legs par// rab mnyam gzhag pas bsnyams nas ni// shi 
27a4(rgyud 'grel): ba thams cad slong ba ste// rdo rje slong ba zhes bya'o// badz+ra a be sha a zhes bya ba yang bzlas brjod 'bum byas la/ rdo rje dril bu mar la blugs te/ bsreg lugs stong gis mngon par sbyangs la/ rdo rje 'bebs 
27a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyag rgyas bzung la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na de 'grub par 'gyur ba lag na thogs pa thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur ro// sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o// // de ltar sngon du bsten pa byas 
27a6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ yul lam/ grong khyer gyi shar ram/ byang gi phyogs kyi char ram/ gang du yid dang mthun pa der dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// der shin tu mnyam zhing snum la 
27a7(rgyud 'grel): shad du gzhol ba/ tshad dang ldan zhing tsha sgo can ma yin pa'i sa'i char rgyal pos ni khru brgya'am lnga bcu'o// blon po dang // blon po chen pos ni/ khru lnga bcu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// tshong dpon nam ded dpon gyis ni 
27a8(rgyud 'grel): nyi shre'am de'i phred do// sgrub pa pos ni khru bcu gnyis sa mjug pa bya'o// de la dang po kho nar mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su/ mi rus kyi bye ma khrag dang drug dang bcas pa dang / 
27b1(rgyud 'grel): mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bzlog la/ bdag dang slob pa dang sa bdag la sogs pa'i zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas sa sbyang du gzhug par bya ste/ 'dom gang tsam la/ lkog 
27b2(rgyud 'grel): ma'am/ lte ba 'am/ pus mo nub pa tsam du 'og tu brkos la/ spos chu bre zhib pos smras pa'i sas bkang la/ rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus chag chag btab ste/ 'dzes par bcags 
27b3(rgyud 'grel): la shin tu mnyam par byas pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du chud pa/ rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas pa/ sgo bzhi dang skar khung gis yongs su bskor ba/ tha mar dril bu legs par btags 
27b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / bla res mchod pa sna tshogs bres pa/ sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris dang sku gzugs kyis nye bar brgyan pa/ grwa bzhir spos snod bzhag la/ me tog dang 
27b5(rgyud 'grel): mar me dang gos la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas la dris byugs te/ rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus yongs su bsangs la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o// sa sbyang 
27b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang yongs su bzung ba'i cho ga'o// // de nas bdag nyid khrus byas shing lus dris byugs la/ ji snyed pa'i gos dang rgyan gdags shing / shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgos la/ me tog gi phreng ba gdags shing 
27b7(rgyud 'grel): gdong dri zhim par byas la/ yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ tshes bcu 'am/ tshes bcu gsum mam/ bcu bzhi nas brtsams te/ bco lnga'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o// // gnyug mar 
27b8(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i sa'i chad ni phyag bdad dang bskyang nul byas la/ de bzhin du lag pas reg par byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzla bar bya'o// de nas cho ga thams cad sprad par bya'o// yang tshes bco lnga'i snga dro nas 
28a1(rgyud 'grel): brtsams te bya'o// dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i zhag ni/ slob dpon dang slob ma dang bcas pas baspang bar gnas par bya'o// de la re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la/ bdag 
28a2(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba dang bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i 'khor los dkyil 'khor sprul la/ phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang sdom pa gzung la/ rnal 'byor chen po dang khang pa 
28a3(rgyud 'grel): brtsegs pa dang gdan la sogs pa bskyed la/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste/ bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o// deng dus bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur 
28a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas// lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par// gud par bdag ni som nyi med// byang chub sems dang sems gcig las// mi ldog par ni bdag 'gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs srin// deng 
28a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag skye bar the tshom med// deng bdag nyi ma dam pa ste// bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas// deng bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no// de nas yan lag thams cad kyis 
28a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag byas te/ spos snod lag tu thogs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o// ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yin// sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyis 
28a7(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// rdo rje can gyis dkyil 'khor bri// deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te/ dngos grub 'di ni srul du gsol zhes brjod la/ dang po'i sbyor ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi mchog dang / las kyi rgyal po 
28a8(rgyud 'grel): mchog rnam par bsgoms nas/ yang sgo dbye ba sngon du 'gro ba nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas su dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas pa'i bar du byas nas/ de'i sngags zlos pa la brtson pa'i 
28b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa la/ sgrub pa'i grogs mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas langs la de bzhin
28b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams gang bar mngon sum du bsams la/ bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag 
28b3(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid// bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che// stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin// bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal// phyag na rdo rje brtan pa dag yin// bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag/ byin gyis 
28b4(rgyud 'grel): brlabs par mi 'dor ro// de nas badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti ma Ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la/ yi ge a las rkang mthil gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed la/ rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings 
28b5(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra satwa utiSh+Tha zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor de nam mkha'i steng du gdeg go/ de nas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya des bdag nyid lan cig byin gyis brlabs la/ yang phyag rgya chen po bcings te/ phyag rgya la gnas 
28b6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin langs// kun tu rnam par bltas nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas// bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor// rdo rje lta ba sa phyogs dang mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / rab 
28b7(rgyud 'grel): dang dra ba byas nas/ rkang mthil nas yongs su bzung ste/ sa bzhi nas ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byas la/ yang bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa byas nas/ sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dang ldan
28b8(rgyud 'grel): pas/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya'o// oM badz+ra maN+Da la hUM dzaHrdo rje khu tshur gnyis mdzub mo dang mthe bong rdo rjer bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs pa yin no// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / 
29a1(rgyud 'grel): ma hA badz+ra tsakra a d+hi tiSh+Tha sid+d+h+ya hUM zhes bya ba 'dis yang dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// rdo rje rgyu'i las kyi phyag rgya nyid 'di'i phyag rgya yin no// de nas seng ldeng las byas pa'i rdo rje'i 
29a2(rgyud 'grel): pur bu/ dbus dang grwa bzhir rdo rjes brdung bar bya ste/ oM badz+ra kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM ban+d+ha hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ste/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa blangs la/ hUM zlos 
29a3(rgyud 'grel): shing de dang dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar phur bu lnga bskyed la/ lag pa g.yas par rdo rje rtsi gsum par byas pas brdung zhing 'di skad ces bzlas par bya'o// oM g+haHg+haHg+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+TAM phaT/ kI la 
29a4(rgyud 'grel): yakI la ya sarba pA paM phaT/ badz+ra kI la ya/ badz+ra d+ha ro Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i bsang chu'i bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhag la/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi las kyi phyag 
29a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas srung ba thams cad brtan par byas la/ rdo rje go chas go beskon par bya ste/ de yang bcing ba'i cho ga sbyor ba la/ rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtag/ rdo rje go chas go bskon pas// dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung 
29a6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// zhes gsungs pa yin no// yang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi gnas dris nye bar byugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gnas/ 
29a7(rgyud 'grel): su tsan dan dang gur kum la sogs pa'i lde gus dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi par byas la/ lhag ma rnams ni zlum por bya zhing rang rang gi sngags kyang lan bdun bdun du bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam mkha'i phyogs 
29a8(rgyud 'grel): nas de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang mnyes pa la sogs pa byas la rang gi snying gar bcug ste/ mchod pa lnga pos legs par mchod do// de nas dbang
29b1(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba'i bum pa 'bru la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan par chu nyung zad gcig blugs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzlas pa'i mchod yon phul te/ spos chu dang me tog kyang bcug 
29b2(rgyud 'grel): la spos kyis bdugs te/ cho ga bzhin du gnas par bya'o// nyin zhag gnyis pa la thun gsum du yang dag par bzla bar bya zhing / de nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// yang dkyil 'khor du bzlas la/ 
29b3(rgyud 'grel): 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid bdag nyid chen pos shes par byas la/ rdo rje sems dpa'i spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas spyan la 
29b4(rgyud 'grel): re re zhing mar la sogs pa'i sreg lugs dbul bar bya'o// lhag par gnas pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga'o// // de nas phyi rol tu gtor ma byin la/ nye reg byas nas/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod 
29b5(rgyud 'grel): de/ me tog la sogs pa dang sgeg mo la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa mchod la/ phyag byas nas slob ma lhag par gnas par bya'o// de la re shig dang por khrus legs par bya'o// gos gtsang ma 
29b6(rgyud 'grel): bgo zhing / lag na me tog thogs pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la/ 'di skad smrar gzhug go/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub 
29b7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs
29b8(rgyud 'grel): gsum dag ni bdag la gsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal// de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste/ rtog pa rnams ni
30a1(rgyud 'grel): legs par bsdus nas ni// shin tu bsam pa bzang po ldan pas nyon// brjed ngas blo la rdo rje sems sogs pa'i// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis byin mi rlob// dbang 
30a2(rgyud 'grel): med bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa dang // rjes su yi rang yang na bgyis su la gang // de dag thams cad byang chub mchog gi ni// spyan sngar da ltar ma lus so sor bshags// bde gshegs sras kyi 
30a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis zab pa dang // rgya ches 'gro ba ma lus pa yi don// sgrub par byed dang de las gzhan la'ang // rtag tu bdag ni rjes su yi rang ngo // thugs rjes khyab pa'i thugs dang ldan gyur cing // blo gros sdig 
30a4(rgyud 'grel): bral gti mug tshogs kun bcom// ma lus rigs kyi pad+ma'i nang zhugs pa// bde bar gshegs pa rnams la skyabs su mchi// blo mchog rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba ste// dman pas 'jigs pa rnams kyi 
30a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal byed chel// srid pa'i 'byor pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mchog/ gsung mchog chos la bdag ni skyabs su mchi// 'dod chags la sogs sbrul gyi dug bcom zhing // blo gros rnam rgyal thugs rje cher 
30a6(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i// brtul zhugs bzang po'i tshogs la skyabs mchi zhing // srid dang bral ba rnams la bdag phyag 'tshal// rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid// 'bras bu'i stobs kyi dgra las rgyal 
30a7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// snying rje'i rtsa ba zug cing yang dag rtogs// mnyam med byang chub rnam par gzung bar bgyi// sems can rnams ni yongs su smin pa'am// yang na yongs su bskyang bar bya phyir ram// rang gi 
30a8(rgyud 'grel): sems ni dag par bya ba'i phyir// 'di dag thams cad rtswa sogs bzhin du btang // de bzhin tshul khrims bzod dang brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan shes dab bla na med pa ni// bdag dang gzhan 
30b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams dag par bya ba'i phyir// skad cig re re zhing yang bsgom par bgyi// bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags la mkhas pa yis// chos rgyal rtag tu lhun gyis grub pa ni// 'gro ba 'di yis thob par bya ba'i 
30b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir// khyad 'phags gnas la bdag ni gnas par bgyi// zhes lan gsum brjod do// bdag gis de skad ces brjod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag gi thams cad yongs su gtang bar bgyi'o// bdag/ 
30b3(rgyud 'grel): gi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa thams cad dang / thabs kyi bye brag thams cad kyi brtul nas/ mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das 
30b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dbyings la rab tu bzhag par bgyi'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang / sems can 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do zhes sems bskyed par
30b5(rgyud 'grel): bgyi'o// bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid du rjes su rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis ma 'ongs pa'i sems dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sems kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par
30b6(rgyud 'grel): bgyi'o// bdag gis theg pa gcig gi tshul du gnas par yang rtogs par bgyi'o// bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas pa so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bslab par bgyi'o// 
30b7(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so sor rtogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par bgyi'o// de bzhin du bdag 
30b8(rgyud 'grel): gis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa ma lus pa'i bar la mngon par gnas par bya ba'i phyir bsgrub par bgyi'o// 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub chen por sems bskyed pa rdo rje/ 
31a1(rgyud 'grel): lta bu yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu bo ste/ 'di nyid
31a2(rgyud 'grel): ni bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'o// de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis ji lta bu bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs par bya ba'i stobs kyis bdag sems bskyed pa 'di la gnas pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa
31a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba sgo mtha' yas pa la gnas pa mtha' med par gyur pa rdzogs par byas/ gdul bya'i 'gro ba'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams la spyod pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i sgo mang po bstan pas yang dag par mgu bar bya/ 
31a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba dang / yang dag par gzengs bstod pa la nges par sbyar bar bgyi'o// de nas sa ma ya a zhes bzlas pas slob ma'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la/ de'i
31a5(rgyud 'grel): steng du rdo rje rtse lnga pa de la bzhag la/ su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM hoHbadz+ra sid+d+ha ya thA su khaM zhes bya ba'i snying gar bzlas la/ spyi bor spos chus brlan pa'i lag pa bzhag ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas shing / rdo rje bsam 
31a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// dpral bar yi ge traM las rin po che/ lkog mar yi ge hrIHlas pad+ma/ spyi bor ka las sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la/ badz+ra satwa/ badz+ra rat+na/ badz+ra d+harma/ badz+ra karma zhes zlos shing rang gi snying ga la 
31a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas rdo rje dris de rnams kyi lag par dri sbyin par bya ste/ me tog gis me tog go/ bdug pas bdug spos dbul lo// mar mes mar me'i snang ba bya'o// de nas u 
31a8(rgyud 'grel): dum bar dang / a shwad tha la sogs pa'i so shing sor bcu gnyis pa rtse mor me tog bcings pa/ rdo rje bzhad pa bzlas la sbyin par bya'o// des kyang shar ram byang du bltas te rtse mo nyid nas bca' bar 
31b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// de nas ku shasar pa la rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su bzlas pa byin nas/ 'dis ni gdan du gding zhing 'dis ni sngas su bgyis la nyol cig ces bsgo'o// de nas dpung pa
31b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon par ni// rdo rje bsrung bas bzlas pa yis// bsrung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa'i// bdag nyid kyis ni legs par bcing // de nas zab cing rgya che ba'i chos ci nus par bstan pas// thams
31b3(rgyud 'grel): cad la gzeng bstong pa byas nas// bzhin bzangs dag longs shig/ nad par dkyil 'khor chen po mthong bar 'gyur ro// zhes bsgo ba lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o// // de nas nyi ma shar kar
31b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor de de bzhin du steng du nam mkha' la gzhag la thig gdab par bya'o// de la dang por re zhig tshon rtsi sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po dri zhim pos bsgos pas srad bu so sor 'dog so sor 
31b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur la/ go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag nas/ de la hUM traM hrIHa oM zhes bya ba'i rang rang gi sa bon las mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu la bkod de/ dAp+ta dr-iSh+Ti aM ku sha dzaHzhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la/ 
31b6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu g.yo zhing 'bar ba'i mig/ mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni// zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa la bskul zhing / bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab par bya
31b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir/ rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig ces bya bas kyang bskul bar bya'o// de nas rang gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis bskul ba'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pas btang ba'i srad bu 'bar ba'i lcags kyus bkug ste 
31b8(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lag na gnas pa la srad bus des gang bar byas la/ a n+yo n+ya a nu ga ta sarba d+harmAHpar s+pha ra a nu pra biSh+Ta/ sarba d+harmAHa t+yan ta/ a nu pra biSh+Ta/ sarba d+harmAHoM badz+ra satwa hUM zhes zlos shing bsgril 
32a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya'o// bsgril nas/ mig g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su ma dang Ta las nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la/ badz+ra driSh+Ti maT ces bya bas brtan par byas la/ srad bu de'i dris byugs pa'i gser la 
32a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i snod du legs par bzhag la/ dri dang / me tog dang bdug spos la sogs pas mchod la/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya sU tre mA ti kra ma hUM zhes bya ba rdo rje bsdams pas bzung ste/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas 
32a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de nas sems dpa' bcu drug bzlas pa'i dris/ dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi yang byugs la/ phyi rol kun tu me tog gis mdzes par byas nas bar snang la bzhugs pa'i rigs thams cad mchod yon phul 
32a4(rgyud 'grel): te/ me tog la sogs pa dang / sgeg mo la sogs pas thams cad mchod la/ phyag byas te/ mig g.yas dang g.yon du yi ge dza ser po bkod la/ nyi ma dang zla ba ser por snang ba bskyed de/ glu dang rol mo la sogs
32a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya'o// de la re zhig sngar sngags bzlas pa'i srad bu dri zhim pa tha ma dkar po dang ldan pa/ yid kyis badz+ra d+hA tu zhes bya ba rdo rje tshig gis bzlas la/ rnam par snang mdzad 
32a6(rgyud 'grel): du gyur par byas nas/ bsgrub pa po'i grogs mchog badz+ra karma zhes brjod de/ rang gi snying nas rdo rje las kyi gzugs su sprul par bya'o// de nas badz+ri satwa zhes brjod de/ rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams 
32a7(rgyud 'grel): la srad bu de g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la/ dza zhes bya bas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rdo rje las kyi gzugs can gyi lag tu srad bu de btang la/ phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsgom zhing / shar
32a8(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su bltas te rdo rje srad bu gdab par bya'o// yang slob dpon lhor 'dug la/ byang du bltas te gnyis pa gdab par bya'o// de nas me'i phyogs kyi char gnas pa la byang du bltas te phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar
32b1(rgyud 'grel): du thig gdab bo// rlung gi phyogs su gnas te lho phyogs su bltas la nub kyi thig gdab bo// de nyid du 'dug ste byang gi thig gdab bo// yang me'i phyogs su 'dug ste lho phyogs kyi thig gdab par bya'o// 
32b2(rgyud 'grel): khakhyer gyi thig kyang gdab par bya'o// yang me'i mtshams su gnas te rlung gi mtshams kwi bar gyi thig gdab pa dang / yang bden bral gyi mtshams su gnas te dbang ldan gyi 'tshams kyi thig gdab par bya 
32b3(rgyud 'grel): zhing / slob dpon dang sgrub pa'i grogs mchog skor phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o// de la re shig srad bu'i sngags ni/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya sU rbaM mA ti kra ma hUM zhes bya ba dang / dza zhes bya ba gsum gyis sgrub pa'i
32b4(rgyud 'grel): grogs mchog gis drang bar bya'o// de la sgo ni cha brgyad pa'o// sgo khyud ni sgo'i tshad kyi phyed do// kha khyer gyi'i thams cad dang nang gi kuni ri sgo'i byed do// tshon sna lnga'i sa ni kha khyer gyi phyed kyi tshad du bya'o// rta babs 
32b5(rgyud 'grel): ni sgo'i sum 'gyur du bya'o// nang gi dkyil 'khor ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed la zur bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor ba// ka ba brgyad dang ldan par thig btab la/ dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar seng ldeng
32b6(rgyud 'grel): gi phur bu 'og rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bul/ steng rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dbyibs can gyi phur bu la/ rdo rje phur bu'i sngags bzlas la rdo rje tho bas brdungs te snga ma bzhin du btab la/ de la brtod pa'i srad bus nang gi dkyil 'khor
32b7(rgyud 'grel): dang phyi'i rdo rje phreng ba dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te g.yas nas bskor ba'i rims kyis gdab par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi tshad kyi nyis 'gyur la/ mtha' bskor khru drug par bya ba ni tshad chung ngu yin te/ gzhan
32b8(rgyud 'grel): dag tu ni ji tsam 'tsham par bya'o// da ni lung las gsungs pa'i thig gi mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste/ sar pa las ni bkal nas kyang // tshad dang ldan pa mdzes pa yi// thig gis mkhas pa ci nus kyis// dkyil 
33a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gyi ni thig gdab po// gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang // rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la// thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa// dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// grwa bzhi phyogs ni 
33a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du// sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams su// rdo rje rin chen spras par ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rol thig gdab po// de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la// 'khor lo 'dra bar rdo rje yi// thig gis yongs su bskor bya 
33a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing // ka ba brgyad kyi mdzes bgyis par// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la// shes rab can gyis thig gdab bo// shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// 
33a4(rgyud 'grel): nang dang phyi rol gyi kha khyer dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / rlung yab dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang bri ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi grwa'i mtshams thams cad du/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril bu
33a5(rgyud 'grel): btags pa'i ba dan sna tshogs btags pa dang / de'i sgo rnams kyi sgo khyud kyis mtshams rnams su/ zla ba phyed pa la gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po ches mdzes par bri bar bya'o// gal te bgegs byung ba bzlog/ 
33a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'dod na/ phur bu'i sngags lan 'bum bzlas pa'i phur dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te gdab par bstan pa dang / dbyibs 'dra ba'i phur bus bgegs thams cad la phur 
33a7(rgyud 'grel): bus gdab par bya'o// de yang ji skad du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la btags nas/ shar nas skor phyogs su zlum por bskor ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor thig btab pa de'i phyi rol du/ khor yug
33a8(rgyud 'grel): chen po de bzhin du zlum por thig btab la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor der grog mkhar gyi sa la sogs pa la bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas la/ brgya byin gyis gzugs brnyan shar phyogs na gnas pa la 
33b1(rgyud 'grel): yi ge i las brgya byin mdog ser po'o// me la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan la yang de bzhin te/ raM las me lha dmar po// oM haM las gshin rje nag po// kaM las srin po nag po// baM las chu lha 
33b2(rgyud 'grel): dkar po// yau las rlung lba dud ka/ phaT las lus ngan po ser po// suM zhes bya ba las dbang ldan dkar po bskyed la/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug ste/ bcug la bcings te dbang du 
33b3(rgyud 'grel): byas nas phur bus gdab bo// shin tu yang yun rings su bgegs med par byed 'dod pas sas dgab par bya'o// de ltar yang gal te bgegs byed na/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor ba byas la/ 'dod 
33b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rgyal pos bkug nas/ ljags kyu la sogs pas kyang dgug pa la sogs pa bas te/ rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings te rkang pa g.yon pas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan mnan te/ hUM baM hUM zhes bya ba la 
33b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas spel ba'i tshul gyis/ g.yor brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la/ bgegs byed pa'i sprin la sogs pa la mngon par bltas te/ phyag rgya 'phangs la/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad du spros 
33b6(rgyud 'grel): pas 'od zer 'bar ba kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis/ rkang pa bteg cing bsnun pas/ sprin la sogs pa thal bar byas par bsams par bya ste/ de lta bus ni bcom pa nyid du 'gyur ro// 
33b7(rgyud 'grel): yang na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la/ de'i 'og tu a las rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas/ rgyud las bshad pa'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur nges par byas la/ haM las 'phags pa mi
33b8(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba yid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ste/ badz+ra ha~M ban+d+ha zhes yid la brjod la/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim du rlung gi phyogs su dris thig le bdun byas te/ thig le re re zhing yang re re'i nang du chud par byas 
34a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ dbus pa dang tha ma dang thig le bdun dang ldan par byas te/ thig le bdud po de dag kyang rlung lha bdun po ro dgas la zhon pa mdog nag po/ 'phags pa mi g.yo bas zhags pas 
34a2(rgyud 'grel): bkug nas bcings par gyur par bsams la/ de rnams kyis dbus pa gcig ni gtso bo yin la/ lhag ma drug de ni de skor te kun gnas par bsam mo// de nas kham por a las ri rab tu 
34a3(rgyud 'grel): bsams la/ de'i steng du a nyid las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rjes g.yogs pa/ dbus su yang rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi ge hUM gi sa bon las byung ba/ mtshams rnams su mdung rtse 
34a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa rnam par bsams la/ de bzhin du badz+ra ha ban+d+ha zhes brjod de/ kham por des ji skad du bshad pa'i thig le bdun dgab par bya'o// de nas kham por dang ri rab kyi steng du oM las bcom 
34a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams te/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar g.yon rkyang bas ri rab mnan nas/ ral gri dang zhags pas rlung rnams la sdigs 
34a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mdzad par bsams te/ de lta bus rlung rnams thams cad bcing bar byas par 'gyur ro// de las chu la sogs pa'i bgegs bzlog pa bshad par bya ste/ haM las rlung dang me'i dkyil
34a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la gnas pa'i 'phags pa mi g.yo bar bdag nyid bskyed la/ grog mkhar gyi sa 'am/ ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas/ khaM las ral gri/ raM las me'i 
34a8(rgyud 'grel): snying po bskyed la/ kaM las zhags pa dang / lugs gru bskyed de/ lag pa g.yon pas gzung la/ lag pa g.yas pas ljags kyu dang zhags pas drangs nas/ bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi nang du 
34b1(rgyud 'grel): bcug ste/ g.yod brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas la/ rkang pa g.yon pas spyi bo nas btsi ra la/ 'di skad ces brjod do// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM tra ka haM maM zhes brjod nas gzugs 
34b2(rgyud 'grel): brnyan de ral gris gtub par bya'o// dug dang ske tshe dang lan tsha la sogs pas gzugs brnyan bskus la mes gdung bar bya'o// me yis gdungs pas de nyid kyang // gdungs par 'gyur bar the tshom 
34b3(rgyud 'grel): med// tshangs pa'am brgya byin yin na yang // de'i mod la myur du 'tshig/ ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// las 'di dag kyang 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor gyis 
34b4(rgyud 'grel): de'i gsang sngags khri bzlas pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas/ de'i 'og tu las bya'o// yang oM AHhUM zhes bya ba 'dis 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po// zhal bzhi pa 
34b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag bzhi pa/ zhabs drug pa/ phyag gnyis na ral gri dang dgra sta bsnams pa/ phyag g.yon gnyis na zhags pa dang gtun shing bsnams pa/ lho phyogs su gzigs pa/ khro bo'i tshogs rnams kyis 
34b6(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha'i khams kun tu gang bar mdzad par rnam par bsams la/ mdung thung gi phyag rgya bcings la/ sprin la sogs pa bzlog pa'i bsams pas tsham ngam dang bcas pas rab tu spyar bar bya'o// 
34b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la/ mdzub mo gnyis sbyar pa ni mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o// de ltar na yang gal te bgegs zhi bar ma gyur na/ kham por so ma btang ba gnyis kyi nang du khrag dang dur khrod kyi 
34b8(rgyud 'grel): sol ba dang dug dang ske tshe dang / da du ra'i lo ma'i khu bas sngags bris la/ yungs kar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ kham por kha sbyar te/ de'i nang du bzhag la/ me'i bgegs la 
35a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa bsams la/ sreg lugs brgya 'am/ sreg lugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas de dag 'jigs pa'am/ 'chi ba 'am/ mi ma yin pas gzung bar 'gyur ro// 
35a2(rgyud 'grel): yang na rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi sbyor bas yi ge hUM bzlas brjod 'bum byas la/ mi rus kyi rgyu las byas pa'i phud bu sor bzhi pa'i tshad tsam la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la 
35a3(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas bkug cing bcug ste bcings nas/ gzugs brnyan la phur bus gdab bo// // de nas me'i tsha bzhi pa bshad par bya ste/ me'i steng du baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du 
35a4(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa'i 'khor lo// de'i steng du bo nyid las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dung dang kun da ltar dkar bar bzhugs te/ mtsho chen po madros pa 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho chen po 
35a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhi las/ chu bo bzhi 'bab pa lta bu'i char gyi rgun bab pas phyogs bcur 'gengs par gyur par bsams par bya'o// rdo rje spyan dang rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kham phor ri rab dang phur bu yang dag 
35a6(rgyud 'grel): par gsungs la/ rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan dag gis// de rnams kyi nam mkha' bcings pa byas la/ rdo rje bcings pas dra ba bya'o// yang na mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gis 
35a7(rgyud 'grel): bgegs bzlog par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na gnas pa'i phur bu hUM bzhis bton la/ 'og nas bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bug bkang la mnyam por gzhag go/ de nas hi zhes 
35a8(rgyud 'grel): bya bas mig g.yas pa dang g.yon par nyi ma dang zla ba bskyed la/ khro bo'i ltabs kun tu bltas la/ sgo rnams bya'o// de nas tshoni rtsi byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ oM badz+ra tsa tra sa pa ya hUM zhes bya bas 'dis 
35b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya dang ldan pas tshon rtsi thams cad la lan bdun gyi bar du mngon par bzlas na rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// de la phyag rgyani 'di yin te/ 
35b2(rgyud 'grel): rdorje'i phyag rgya gnyis las ni// mdzub mo rtse mo mnyam sbyar ba// byas nas chen rtsi thams cad ni// 'bar po'i skyabs dgug par bya// hi zhes bya ba dang / rdo rngonya ma'i khro ba'i dmachog gang gi phyag r+b+ha 
35b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis mthar sbar bar bya'o// oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM zhes zlos shing dbang ldan phyogs nas brnams te/ g.yas nas bskor bas g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis tshon rtsa 
35b4(rgyud 'grel): dgye bar bya ste/ phyis ci bder bya'o// de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/ sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po'o// rim pa 'dis ci bder dgye'o// khru drug par bya ba ni chen rtse'i ri mo chung 
35b5(rgyud 'grel): tshad yin te/ de phan tshad khru bkyed pas rkang pa bkyed par bya'o// de yang rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las/ sngon po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin// gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste// pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin gzhan// de bzhin 
35b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dag mar gad 'dra// dkar po nang du shes bya ste// 'di na tshon gyi rim par bshad// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// shar phyogs suni sngon po che// lhor ni ser po dang / 
35b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa// nub kyi tshan dmar po ste// byung ni ljang gur yang dag ldan// dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid ni// shel ltar snang ba bla na med// rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing // rab mnyam gzhag skyed yis bri// rdo rje 
35b8(rgyud 'grel): ka ba'i nang logs su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs bzhag cing // sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi// dkyil 'khor
36a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi dbus rnams su// rim bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog/ bzhi po legs par gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu// rdo rje gom pas song nas ni// mi g.yo ba la 
36a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad gzhag/ mi g.yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par bzhag/ rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par bzhag 
36a3(rgyud 'grel): tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje spyan sogs rdzogs par bzhag/ gdon mi za yi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje rgya gram la sogs bzhag/ 'khor lo yi ni grwa rnams su// rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang bzhag/ 
36a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor phyi rol grwa rnams su// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang bzhag/ sgo rnams kun gyi nang du ni// sgo srungs bzhi yang bzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs su ni// sems dpa'
36a5(rgyud 'grel): chen po rnams kyang bzhag/ de la rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM badz+ra be gA kra ma hUM/ de la 'di'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te/ yid kyis ri mo bteg nas ni// rdo rje srad bu'am gzhan yang rung / 
36a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir 'byung nang du zhugs kyang ni// dam tshig nyams par de mi 'gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snang mdzad ni/ sku mdog dkar po seng+ge'i gdan la rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ byang chub mchog 
36a7(rgyud 'grel): gaM phyag rgyas rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa/ nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba/ dar la'i stod g.yogs dang / smad g.yogs mnabs pa/ rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa/ zhal bzhi pa 
36a8(rgyud 'grel): zhal dang po shar du gzigs pa'o// de bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin te/ sku mdog kyang sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / glang po che la sogs pa'i gdan la rdo rje skyil 
36b1(rgyud 'grel): mo krung gis bzhugs pa/ rdo rje rtse lnga pa dang / rdo rje rin po che dang / rdo rje pad+ma dang / sna tshogs rdo rje la sogs pa bsnams pa'o// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che cod pan dang / dar dpyangs kyis dbang 
36b2(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba dang ldan pa/ zhal gcig rnam par snang mdzad la mngon sum du phyogs pa rnams rang rang gi phyag rgya chen po dang badz+ra d+hA tu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i snying po zlos shing bzhugs su gsol la/ 
36b3(rgyud 'grel): bris pa ltar bar snang la bzhugs pa rnams kyang de bzhin du bab te gcig tu bya'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngang / satwa badz+ri zhes bya bas rdo rje sems ma sku mdog sngon mo// rdo rje 
36b4(rgyud 'grel): rtse lnga pa dmar po bkod la/ badz+ra A be sha a zhes bya bas dbab par bya'o// g.yas su rat+na badz+ri zhes bya bas rin chen sems ma sku mdog ser mo// yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan 
36b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rgyab tu d+harma badz+ri zhes bya bas rdo rje chos ma sku mdog dmar mo// pad+ma dkar dmar 'dab ma bcu drug pa la 'dab ma brgyad thur du gyes pa/ 'dab ma brgyad gyen du bltas pa kham bye ba'i nang na rdo rje rtse lnga pa chung 
36b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// g.yon du karma badz+ri zhes bya bas/ rdo rje la sa ma sku mdog ljang gu/ sna tshogs rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa kha dog lnga pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i mthar thug pa'i bar ni/ 
36b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya chen pos rang rang gi mtshan ma/ rdo rje la sogs pa bsnams pa/ rab tu dgyes pas spyan gdangs pa/ sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa yin no// rnam par snang mdzad ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo
36b8(rgyud 'grel): nyid yin la/ 'di dag thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir/ rnam par snang mdzad la mngon par phyogs par bya'o// mi bskyod pa'i mdun du ni rdo rje sems dpa'o// / 
37a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas su ni rdo rje rgyal po'o// g.yon du ni rdo rje chags pa'o// rgyab tu ni rdo rje legs pa'o// rin chen 'byung ldan gyi mdun du ni rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o// lhag ma na 
37a2(rgyud 'grel): shes pa kho nar zad do// phyir dkyil 'khor gyi khyams la byams pa la sogs pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhi yis stong du ma tshang ba/ shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs su cha 
37a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam po go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de la shar phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsnams pa'o// lho phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje rin po che bsnams pa'o// nub phyogs pa rnams ni rdo rje pad+ma bsnams pa'o// 
37a4(rgyud 'grel): byang phyogs pa rnams ni sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa'o// de nas 'di rnams dgod pa'i rim pa dang / mtshan ni 'di yin te/ oM sarba saM ka ra pa ri shud+d+harma te ga ga na sa mud ga te ma hA ya na pa ri bA re swA hA/ zhes 
37a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba 'di ni rig pa'o// de la de rnams kyi mtshan ni/ byams pa/ seng ge/ rab gsal/ thub pa/ me tog/ me tog gnyis pa/ spyan legs/ ded dpon/ legs chen/ stobs chen/ rgyu skar rgyal po// rtsi sman/ 
37a6(rgyud 'grel): snyan pa tog/ 'od chen po// grol ba'i phung po// rnam par snang mdzad/ nyi ma'i snying po// zla 'od 'phro// 'od bzang / mya ngan med/ skar rgyal/ rab gsal/ phreng thogs/ yon tan 'od/ don gzigs/ mad me/ 
37a7(rgyud 'grel): mthu ldan/ sman pa/ nges pa/ mdzod pu/ brtan ldan/ lha'i dpal/ gdugs dga'/ yon tan rgyal mtshan/ sgra gcan/ tshogs can/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ tshig brtan/ mi 'gyeng ba/ 'od mdzad/ ldan 
37a8(rgyud 'grel): chen/ rdo rje/ sdom pa can/ mi bsnyengs pa/ rin chen/ pad+ma'i spyan/ stobs sde/ me tog 'od zer/ ye shes dgyes/ gzi chen/ tshangs pa/ 'od dpag med/ klu sbyin/ brtan par gshegs/ don yod 
37b1(rgyud 'grel): mthong / brtson 'grus sbyin/ bzang skyong / dga' bo/ 'chi med/ seng ge'i rgyal mtshan/ rgyal ba chos/ mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po// kha lo bskur/ dgyes par gshegs/ chu lha/ yon tan lag 
37b2(rgyud 'grel): spos kyi glang po// rnam par gzigs/ 'brug sgra/ legs sems/ yid bzangs/ dri med/ zla ba/ grags chen/ gtsug na nor bu/ drag shul can/ seng ge'i stabs/ ljon pa/ rnam par rgyal ba 
37b3(rgyud 'grel): can/ shes rab brtsegs/ legs gnas blo gros/ yan lag skyes/ blo mtha' yas/ gzugs bzang / mkhyen ldan/ 'od zer/ brtul zhugs brtan/ bkra shis/ bden pa'i rtog/ pad+ma/ 
37b4(rgyud 'grel): sred med kyi bu/ lag bzangs/ ye shes 'byung gnas/ yon tan 'od 'phro// tshangs pas byin/ rin chen 'byung gnas/ lha'i me tog/ don legs sems pa/ chos kyi dbang phyug/ blo gros grags pa// 
37b5(rgyud 'grel): spobs pa brtsegs pa/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan/ phan par bzhed pa/ rnam par rol ldan/ mun pa dang bral ba/ sgra gcan lha/ ri bo'i rgyal mtshan/ tshogs can 'od/ rin chen snying po/ shin tu mthor gshegs/ 
37b6(rgyud 'grel): skar rgyal/ ru rings/ yon tan grags pa/ nyi zla/ nyi ma'i 'od/ skar mkhan seng ge'i tog/ dus mkhyen rgyal po// dpal gyi snying po// srid mtha' gzigs pa/ glog gi 'od/ gser gyi ri bo// seng ges
37b7(rgyud 'grel): byin pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal mtshan/ mchog dga' grags pa/ brtson 'grus brtan pa/ grags pa rdzogs pa/ bsnyengs pa dang bral ba/ mchod 'os lha/ sgron ma chen po// 'jig rten 'od/ spos dri 
37b8(rgyud 'grel): zhim pa yon tan mchog 'dzin/ mun pa dang rnam par bral ba/ seng ge'i 'gram pa/ rin chen grags pa/ skyon ra bzhi pa/ bdud rtsi 'chang ba/ mi'i zla ba/ shin tu gzigs pa/ rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu'i
38a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od/ ri bo brtsegs pa'i tog/ chos kyi 'byung gnas/ tshe sbyir/ rin chen 'byung gnas/ skye dbang batshungs pa/ stabs kyis gshegs pa/ blo gnas/ gdugs mdzes pa/ gtso bo// shin

38a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyangs pa'i blo/ zil gnon ye shes/ mtha' yas pa'i spyan/ bde bar gsung / nyi ma'i 'od/ nges pa'i blo/ mtha' yas gzugs/ rnam par snang mdzad/ rin chen tog/ the tshom rnam par spangs pa/ 'jig rten
38a4(rgyud 'grel): 'das pa/ don yod/ rnam par gnon pa/ rtog par mdzad pa/ me tog rgyal mtshan/ ri dbang rgyal po// gzi brjid chen po// don mdzad gzigs pa/ grags pa mtha' yas/ rin chen lha/ don gnas mkhyen pa/

38a7(rgyud 'grel): cad gzigs pa/ dpa' bo// 'byor ldan/ bsod nams/ sgron pa/ yon tan 'od 'phro blo yangs/ legs skyes/ nor lha/ yid gnyis spong / 'dzin pa dpag med/ mchog sred/ choms med/ mi gnas pa/ der gnas/ 
38a8(rgyud 'grel): tshegs can gtso bo// 'gro ba'i 'od zer/ phal chen rgyal ba/ gzi brjid mtha' yas/ don blo gros/ sman pa'i rgyal po// thab spangs pa/ rims nad med pa/ legs sbyin/ grags byin/ me tog byin/ skyes 
38b1(rgyud 'grel): bu byin/ rdo rje sde/ phal chen sbyin/ zhi ba'i blo gros/ spos kyi glang po// sred med kyi bu/ des pa/ mi tshugs pa/ nyi zla/ glog gi rtog/ mchod pa/ zhes bya ba ste/ nyis brgya lnga bcur gcig gis ma tshangs pa ni 
38b2(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bris par bya'o// // dpal sbas/ ye shes nya pa/ ngor grub/ lhun po brtsegs/ dgra 'dul/ pad+ma/ dgra bcom grags pa/ ye shes 'gros/ nyon mongs bral/ 'dam 
38b3(rgyud 'grel): bu/ spos bzangs/ yul 'khor rangs/ lha grags/ srid mtha' gzigs/ zla ba/ sgra gcan/ rin chen zla ba/ seng ge'i rgyal mtshar/ bsam gtan dgyes/ rdzogs ldan/ rnam par rol pa/ yon tan 
38b4(rgyud 'grel): rin chen/ dgra bcom grags pa/ pad+ma'i ngos/ mdzod spu ldan/ spobs pa grags/ rdo rje nor bu/ tshe dpag med/ nor bu bkod/ dbang chen/ yon tan 'byung gnas/ lhun po grags/ 'od zer bcu pa/ ma 
38b5(rgyud 'grel): smad pa/ glang po'i 'gros yid 'thad/ rin cher zla ga zhi ba/ rab gsal rgyal po// kha lo bsgyur/ dga' ba'i dbang phyug/ gtsug na rin po che/ bsnyengs bral/ rin chen snying po// zla zhal/ dri ma med 
38b6(rgyud 'grel): par grags pa/ zhi ba'i gzi brjid/ dga' ba'i rtog/ sgra gcan lha/ na tshed bzang po// lha dga'/ rin chen phung po// mdzes par gshegs/ seng ge'i phyogs pa/ shin tu mthor gshegs/ skye ba'i dbang po// 
38b7(rgyud 'grel): blo gros bzang po// 'jig rten 'od/ rin chen gzi brjid/ skal ldan/ shing rta/ kun tu rgyal ba/ dga' ba bkod pa/ stobs mdzad pa/ spos kyi glang po// blo gros 'od 'phro// ri bo'i rgyal mtshan/ rin chen spos bzang/ 
38b8(rgyud 'grel): chos brtan/ gzi brjid drag shul can/ chos kyi nor bu/ bzang pos byin pa/ bde gshegs bla ba/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ seng ge'i zla ba/ mtshungs pa med pa'i dpal/ legs par skye ba/ thub pa med pa'i 
39a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs/ grags pa'i bshes gnyen/ bden pa/ dka' thub chen po// lhun po'i 'od zer/ yon tan brtsegs pa/ mchod pa grags pa/ chos grags/ sbyin pa'i 'od/ glog 'byin/ bden par

39a3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gzhungs pa/ nor bu'i zla ba/ drag shul 'od zer/ brtul zhugs thub med/ 'gro bas mchod pa/ nor bu'i tshogs/ 'jig rten bla ma/ glang chen seng ge/ zla ba/ rin chen 'od zer/ sgra gcan sbed pa/ yon tan rgya mtsho// 
39a4(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer ldan pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i stabs/ 'jig rten bzang po// mya ngan med pa/ shugs bcu pa/ stobs la dgyes pa/ mthu dpal/ mthu thob pa/ mthu chen po// yon tan snying po// bden par spyod pa/ dge mchog 
39a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po// skar rgyal/ 'od zer chen po// glog gi khod/ yon tan rgya chen/ rin po che/ dpal 'od/ bdud 'dul bar mdzad pa/ go cha bgos pa/ seng ge'i phyag/ me tog bzang po// rin chen mthon po// rgyal mtshos 'dzin/ don gyi 
39a6(rgyud 'grel): blo mnga' ba/ yon tan bsags pa/ yon tan tshogs/ rin chen me/ 'jig rten 'das pa/ 'jig rten zla ba/ dbyangs snyan pa/ tshangs pa'i tog/ tshogs can gtso bo// seng ge'i stabs/ drag shul gyis byin pa/ chos 
39a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbang phyug/ gzi brjid 'od/ 'od zer chen po// rin chen grags pa/ tshogs can gsal ba/ grags pa mtha' yas/ 'od zer don yod/ lha'i drang srong / skye ba'i dbang po// dge 'dun brtan/ phyogs bzang
39a8(rgyud 'grel): tog/ yul 'khor me tog/ chos kyi blo gros/ rlung gi shugs ltar gshegs pa/ legs bsams grags pa/ snang ldan/ lha tshogs/ yon tan bsrungs/ don gyi blo gros/ bsnyengs med/ grogs brtan/ 
39b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od gnas mtshungs/ nor bu'i zhabs/ thar pa'i gzi brjid/ ngos bzangs/ blo bzangs/ kun tu gzi brjid/ ye shes mchog/ tshangs par gnas/ bden par gsung / blo bzangs/ stobs byin/ seng ge 
39b2(rgyud 'grel): stabs/ me tog/ ye shes 'byung gnas/ me tog byin/ yon tan snying po// rin chen grags pa/ grags parmad du byung ba/ mi mtshungs pa/ brnyengs med/ nyi ma'i 'od/ tshangs par gshegs pa/ lha'i mthu rtul/ 
39b3(rgyud 'grel): ye shes dgyes/ lha bden/ nor bu'i snying po// ye shes dpal/ bcings med/ brtul zhugs brtan/ lha'i gzi brjid/ tshangs pa thub/ dal gyis bzhud/ brtul zhugs/ dka' thub/ 'od zer phung po// gzi brjid 
39b4(rgyud 'grel): chen po// tsam paka/ dga' mdzad/ tshogs can bzang po// dbang po'i rgyal mtshan/ dgyes pa chen po// sna ma'i me tog 'od/ tshogs can 'od/ sbun par mdzad/ mdangs 'gro// don legs nges/ khyu mchog/ lag 
39b5(rgyud 'grel): bzangs/ 'od zer chen po// bsam pas byin/ bsod nams 'od/ rin chen dbyangs/ rdo rje'i sde/ 'byor ldan/ seng ge'i stobs/ dri ma med pa'i spyan/ 'od bsrungs/ blogs la/ ye shes 'gros/ gzi brjid 
39b6(rgyud 'grel): drag shul can/ 'od zer chen po// nyi ma'i 'od dri ma med pa'i 'od/ gzi brjid rnam par 'byes pa/ khengs med/ sbrang rtsi'i zhal/ zla 'od glog sbyin/ rab tu zhi bar gshegs/ mi 'khrugs pa/ dgra bcom grags 
39b7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ chos kyi yon tan/ zhing bzang po// bkod pa'i rgyal po// mngon par 'phags pa/ sbyin sreg 'od 'phro// pad+ma'i dpal/ rin po che'i bkod pa/ shin tu bzang po// rin po che'i mchog/ thugs shin tu gzhungs pa/ 
39b8(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag med/ rgya mtshos byin/ tshangs pa'i tog/ zla ba'i gdugs/ 'od 'phro ba/ dri med rgyal po// 'di rnams ni lho phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o// // ye shes grags pa/ kun las rgyal ba 
40a1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan yod/ rnam par grags pa/ klu brgyas pa/ pad+ma'i 'od zer/ brtul zhugs bzang po// snor brtul po// zlog ge tog/ 'od zer rgyal po// skar mkhan/ grags pa rdzogs ldan 
40a2(rgyud 'grel): bad+ha'i snying po// rgyal ga mdzes/ rnyog pa med pa'i don/ drag shul sde/ bsod nams gzi brjod/ mthu rgyal can/ thogs med blo// sgrag canaH/ ye shes phung po// kha lo srA ga/ g+hi dbang mtshungs pa/ 
40a3(rgyud 'grel): man to// skrag can 'dzin/ rtsis chen po// nu g+ha rgyal pa// sman pa'i rgyal po// bsod nams glang po// mdzed par mdzad pa/ rnam par grags pa'i rgyal po// nyi ma'i 'od zer/ chos rje mdzod/ zlog 
40a4(rgyud 'grel): bzang po// yon tan dbang mtshungs/ rdo rje'i sde/ shes rab brtsegs/ legs par gnas/ blo sbyangs/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ yon tan chog/ 'brug sna dbyangs/ mngon par shes pa'i tog

40a6(rgyud 'grel): dpa' bo// pad+ma'i phung po// me tog rgyas pa/ man rtsal sleb seM/ bsad rnams phung po// gzugs mchog/ ga ma pan/ zla ba'i sngon ma/ gzi brjid phung po// byang chub rgyal po// mi zad pa/ mngon par rtogs

40a8(rgyud 'grel): can/ dbang po// shugs 'chang gar rgyal/ 'od bzang po// zags pabyin pa/ gzugs bzang po// rgyal po// don grub pa/ seng ge'i sde/ nor lha'i bu/ grags pa/ rgyal pa/ brgya byin sring po/ khas 
40b1(rgyud 'grel): nams 'od zer/ 'od zer bzang po// spyad 'don/ sgron ma'i rgyal po// ye shes brtsegs lha mchog/ sa'i bdag po// rnam par grol ba brnyes pa/ gtsug gi gser/ sgra gcan bzang po// thub dka' thub

40b7(rgyud 'grel): rnam par grol ba'i gtsug/ chos ldan/ spos gnas/ dregs pa spangs/ ye shes kyi mdzod/ tshangs par gshegs/ tsan+dan/ mya ngan med pa/ seng ge'i 'od zer/ yul 'khor tog/ pad+ma'i snying po// gzi brjid 
40b8(rgyud 'grel): mtha' yas/ lha'i 'od zer/ shes rab me tog/ mkhas pa/ ye shes 'byor ldan/ tshangs pa dbyig/ phyag na rin chen/ dbang ldan rdzogs par gsung ba/ mchog gsung / mchod 'os/ skar rgyal/ nyi ma/ 'dam/

41a7(rgyud 'grel): mthu'i dpal/ 'phags pa dgyes pa/ mthu stobs/ skar ma la dgyes pa/ sprin gyi rnga sgra/ 'di rnams ni nub kyi phyogs kyi nang du bre bar bya'o// // spyan sdug pa'i zhal/ ye shes bzang ldan/ 'byor par ldan pa/ 
41a8(rgyud 'grel): yon tan phung po// gsal ba/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan/ ye shes pa ro// nam mkha'/ mchod sbyin nga ro// shes rab rnam rgod nga ro// yon tan 'od zer gzi brjid/ drang srong dbang po// blo dang ldan pa/ spobs pa'i

41b2(rgyud 'grel): dgyes pa/ seng ge'i stobs/ dbang sgyur rgyal po// bdud rtsi gsal ba/ bsam gtan snyoms pa/ 'khrug pa med pa/ dri mar bzhi/ phyogs ma smad pa/ mdzes pa zhal bzangs/ shugs gnas ye shes

41b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen/ dag pa'i rgya mtsho// rin chen mnga'/ mi dma' ba/ skye bo dga' bar mdzad pa/ rma bya'i nga ro// ma zhum pa/ srid pa'i sred pa dri ma spangs pa/ spyod pa'i stegs/ lha mang pos snyan par grags pa/ rin po che'i 
41b7(rgyud 'grel): stabs/ phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa/ dpal/ dgra las rgyal ba/ 'byor ldan grags pa/ yul 'khor bzang po// me tog 'od// seng ge'i nga ro// zla ba ltar shar ba/ 'joms pa'i mchog/ mi 
41b8(rgyud 'grel): g.yo ba/ phan pa dang ldan par gshegs pa/ bsod nams sgron ma'i rgyal po// dbyangs kyi bskul ba/ gau ta ma/ mdangs stobs/ blo gnas pa'i rang bzhin/ zla ba bzang po// byang chub yan lag me tog/ 
42a1(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis/ legs ston/ ye shes gzi brjid stobs/ dge ba'i sgron ma/ mthu rtsal brtan po// lha dgra/ rab tu zhi ba/ nyi ma'i zhal/ thar pa'i brtul zhugs/ tshul khrims 'od/ brtul

42a7(rgyud 'grel): me tog 'od/ sman pa'i bdag po// mdangs mnga'/ bsod nams dgyes/ dga' ba'i stobs/ dbyangs snyan pa/ chos kyi dbang phyug/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ spyod pa bzang po// 'khrul pa med pa'i blo/ 
42a8(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs chen po snyan par grags pa/ tog ldan/ gzi brjid/ rnam par grags pa/ 'gro ba'i dbang phyug/ ljon pa/ gti mug rab zab/ dpag tu med pa/ zla ba bzang po// spobs pa mtha' yas rtog 
42b1(rgyud 'grel): brtul zhugs bstar ba/ mchod pa'i gnas/ mya ngan rgal/ dge ba dgyes pa/ 'gro ba'i blo gros dgyes par gshegs pa/ zhabs mdzes/ ut+pal/ dul gnas me tog/ spobs pa mtha' yas 'od 
42b2(rgyud 'grel): ber/ drang srong gsal ba/ yon tan brtson 'grus/ snying po// lha'i bdag po// rin chen mthon po// gsal ba/ skal ldan shing rta can/ bsod nams blo gros/ sbyin sreg 'od 'phro// yon tan mtha' yas/ 
42b3(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid phung po// seng ge stabs/ mi g.yo ba/ rab gsal 'od sprod pa/ glu dbyangs/ 'khor lo 'dzin pa/ dbyig gi mchog/ 'jig rten dga' ba/ dga' ba mtha' yas grags pa/ sprin gyi tog/ shes
42b4(rgyud 'grel): rab 'gros/ spros bzangs/ nam mkha'i dbyings/ lha/ lha'i rgyal po// nor bu gsal ba/ nor bzangs/ sgron ma/ rin chen nga ro dbyangs/ skye dbang rgyal po// sgra gcan sbed pa/ dge ba mdzod/ seng ge'i
42b5(rgyud 'grel): blo gros/ rin chen grags pa/ don mdzad pa// mdzad mtha' gzigs pa/ srid pa'i me tog/ mdzod spu ldan pa/ spobs pa mtshungs med pa rgyal po// ye shes rnam 'byed nga ro// seng ge'i mche ba/ mdzes par gshegs 
42b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bsod nams sgron ma/ bkra shis ldan pa// yul 'khor mya ngan med pa/ blo gros sems pa/ blo dang ldan pa/ chos kyi sgron ma spyan/ shin tu gzigs pa/ shugs kyis 'dor ba/ stobs chen/ shes rab 
42b7(rgyud 'grel): me tog/ brtan pa'i dbyangs/ bde dang ldan pa/ don gsung pa/ dgyes pa gsal ba/ seng ge'i zhal gtsug pud/ snang bar mdzad pa/ 'di rnams ni byang phyogs kyi khyams kyi nang du bri bar bya'o// / 
42b8(rgyud 'grel): yang na byams pa dang / mthod ba don yod dang / ngan song kun 'dren dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros/ spos kyi glang po// dpa' bar 'gro ba/ nam mkha'i mdzod/ ye shes tog/ 
43a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od dpag tu med pa/ zla ba'i 'od/ bzang stong / dra ba can gyi 'od/ rdo rje snying po// blo gros mi zad pa/ spobs pa brtsegs pa/ kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba bcu drug po ji ltar mngon par dga' 
43a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sku mdog dang / rgyan dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i cod pan dang dang dpyangs kyi dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa dgod par bya'o// // phyogs bzhi yang rta babs bzhi dang ka ba brgyad/ khru drug gam bdun gyi tshad 
43a3(rgyud 'grel): tsam rin po che la sogs pa'i rgyu las byas pa/ me tog gi phreng ba dang dril bu dang dar la sogs pas brgyan pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' mngon par bzlas par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi char/ 'phags pa

44b1(rgyud 'grel): dpa'i sngags kyang blang bar bya'o// de nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas/ bdag rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa mi gang yang rung ba brjod la/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi

47a7(rgyud 'grel): tshul du bzhag pa de ni/ ku be ra'i dam tshigi phyag rgya las/ gung mo gnyis brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ oM ku be rA ya swA thA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bltas te 'dug la/

47b1(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// mthe bong gnyis rab tu gshi bas te bzhag la/ de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun rtse me sprad nas nang du g.yab pa ni/ dbang ldan gyis spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las snga ma bzhin du 
47b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzub mo rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag pa ni/ dbang ldan gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni/ dzum dzum shi ba swA hA/ steng gi phyogs su 
47b3(rgyud 'grel): bltas te 'dug la/ g.yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas 'dug la thal mo khong stong du sbyar te bzhag la/ steng du bltas te mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyu ni/ tshangs pa la sogs pa spyan drang bar bya'o// de 
47b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid mdzub mo gnyis snga ma ltar bzhag pa ni/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni/ slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags 'di yin te/ oM ur d+hi brah+ma 
47b5(rgyud 'grel): Ne swA hA/ sUR+ya ya gra he a d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ tsan+d+ra ya nak+Sha tra ya a d+hi ba ta ye swA hA/ rkang pa gnyis mnyam par gnas pas 'dug la/ lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/ sor mo rnams par mtsham sa 
47b6(rgyud 'grel): med par rtse mo phan tshun sbyar te/ mthe bong zlum por byas la/ 'og gi phyogs su bltas te/ sa'i lha mo la sogs pa mdzub mo'i lcags kyus spyan drang ba ni/ 'og gi lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i
47b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya las/ snga ma bzhin du mdzub mo bzhag pa ni/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo gnyis btang ba ni slar btang ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni ar+N+No pri the de bya swA hA/ a su re b+h+yaHswA hA/ nA ge b+h+yaHswA hA/ 
47b8(rgyud 'grel): de nas rang gi sngags de nyid kyis thams cad la 'thor 'thung phul la/ bdag dang slob ma'i tshegs su bcas pa la bgegs med par mdzod cig/ las kyi dngos grub kyang bdag la gsol cig/ ces
48a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa thams cad slar gtong ngo // yang na dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul/ 
48a2(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po// dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang // gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bu smad tshogs bcas g.yog 'khor bcas rnams la// bdag/ 
48a3(rgyud 'grel): gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su// thal mo sbyar te khyod la gsol 'debs kyis// gsan nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir spyon cig/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang // dga' ba'i tshal dang 
48a4(rgyud 'grel): lha yi gnas rnams dang // shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang // ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang // chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang // rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang // mtsho dang 
48a5(rgyud 'grel): rdzing dang lteng ka'i chu ngogs dang // g.ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang // grong dang bug lhas grong khyer stong pa dang // khang stong dag dang lha yi khang pa dang // gtsug lag khang ngam grong khyer gnas dag 
48a6(rgyud 'grel): gam// dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni// rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang // lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang // gang dag lam chen dang ni shing gcig drung // dur khrod 
48a7(rgyud 'grel): chen po nags khrod chen po 'am// seng ge dred dang gcan zan gnas ngag dang // 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang // gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang // lhun po dur khrod dag na 
48a8(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa rnams// rab tu dgyes te mgu bar gyur nas su// me tog phreng dang dri dang bdug pa dang // bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus 'bul bas// 'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams nas su// 
48b1(rgyud 'grel): las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nas su// de nas phyogs skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin// shar phyogs rdo rje can te lha tshogs bcas// gtor ma
48b2(rgyud 'grel): phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol// me dang gshin rje bden bral srin po bdag/ chu bdag rlung bdag nor gyi bdag po ste// dbang ldan lha ste 'byung po'i bdag po dang // steng gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po 
48b3(rgyud 'grel): dang // lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang // ri yi lha dang gnod sprin tshogs rnams la// so so so sor gtor ma phul ba rnams// rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang // rang rang phyogs su 
48b4(rgyud 'grel): legs par bzhugs nas su// rang gi bu smad mdza' bshes gnyen bdun dang // nang gi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs cig tu// me tog dri dang byug pa gtor mar bcas// 'di rnams btung zhing legs 
48b5(rgyud 'grel): par gsol nas kyang // bdag gi las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// // de nas nye reg byas la/ dpal rdo rje sems dpas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi cho gas/ sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo// 
48b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i snying pos ni/ sreg blugs bdun bdun 'bul lo// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// rdo rje slob
48b7(rgyud 'grel): dpon dka' thub ches// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// slob ma rnams ni gzhug par bgyid// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir gzhug pa la/ snod du gyur pa dang / ma gyur pa brtags 
48b8(rgyud 'grel): mi 'tshal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa yang mchis te/ de dag gis rdo rje dbyings kyi/ dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong na ngan song thams cad dang bral
49a1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor dang bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la sogs pa dang / dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang / sngar spyad pa la sogs pa'i nus
49a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems can yang mchis te/ de dag kyang 'dir ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni/ gar dang //

49a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung ba der ni/ bslab pa'i tshig gis 'jigs shing skrag nas mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par kha bltas shing / gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang 
49a6(rgyud 'grel): mgu ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub cing / bde ba dang yid bde ba'i myong bar bgyid pa dang / ngan song gi rgud thams cad du 'jug par kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rdo rje dbyings 
49a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug tu rung ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos can gyi sems can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dam pa grub 
49a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs kyis/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub tshol ba ni/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / sa rnams kyang 'bad cing nyon mongs pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 
49b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'grub par dga' ba yang ma lags na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang 'tshal zhes zhus par bya'o// de nas slob ma gzhug
49b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ de la slab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su gzung ba'i dge bsnyen nam/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge slong gi sdom pa yongs su blangs pa slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pas/ slob dpon gyi zhabs
49b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas/ slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul brtan pa// mgon po chen po 
49b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// rdo rje bsrung ba yongs su bzlas la// stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs
49b5(rgyud 'grel): bskon zhing / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo bsrungs bzhis/ bzlas pa'i gdong g.yogs bcings la/ phyag bzhi byed du gzhug par bya'o// yang lag na me tog thogs
49b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i slob mas slob dpon la phyag byas la/ lag na me tog thogs pa nyid dang / bshags pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / bskul ba dang / gsol ba yang byas la/ 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// 
49b7(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo bdag la sdom pa stsol// thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba ni// slob dpon dpang du gnas pa la// sangs rgyas rol mo las 
49b8(rgyud 'grel): byung ba// mi ldog pa yi 'khor los 'byor// thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer cher// gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi// gsang ba chen po bsdus pa ni// slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod// 
50a1(rgyud 'grel): mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba// skal pa chen po bdag la stsol// mtshan rnams kyis ni rgyas btab cing // dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas kun gyis yid 'ong ba// slob dpon 
50a2(rgyud 'grel): chen po bdag la stsol// dbang bskur chen po rmad byung ba// sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur// slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol// de nas slob dpon gyi rigs thams cad la 
50a3(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ che ge zhes bya ba 'di nyid ni/ byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing // dam tshig sngom dang gsang ba yi// 'khor lo 'dir yang 'jug par 'tshal// de nas yang slob dpon gyis// 'di
50a4(rgyud 'grel): skad ces brjod par bya ste/ gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i// gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni// bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam// des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya// yang slob dpon gyis 'di skad
50a5(rgyud 'grel): ces brjod par bya ste/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dag/ blo chen
50a6(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis bzung bar gyis// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// shes rab dril bu zhes brjod do// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i// sdom pa dam
50a7(rgyud 'grel): tshig yin par gsungs// rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// 'di ni rin chen rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig/ 
50a8(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa yin par gsungs// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam chos khyod kyis gsung bar bya// 'di ni pad+ma rigs dag pa'i// dam pa'i sdom pa yin par gsungs// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// 
50b1(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyis// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// gzhan yang bcu bzhi 'di dag ni// phas pham par ni rab tu bshad// spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste// rtsa ba'i/ 
50b2(rgyud 'grel): ltung bar shes par bya// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// nyin re bzhin ni bklag par bya// gang tshe nyams na rnal 'byor pa// kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur// khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya// ma byin par ni/ 
50b3(rgyud 'grel): blang mi bya// 'dod pa log par mi spyad cing // brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o// phur khrol kun gyi rtsa ba yi// chang ni rnam par spang bar bya// sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa// bya ba ma yin thams cad spang //

50b8(rgyud 'grel): 'das la dgod ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o// gang zhig sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed pa de la/ deng khyod ces bya ba la sogs pa yang brjod par mi bya ste/ slob dpon du rjes su gnang ba dang dbang bskur

52a1(rgyud 'grel): du gzhug go// 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags/ rdo rje ye shes bla med ni// de ring nyid du 'bab par shog/ badz+ra A be sha a zhes bya ba lan bcun sa brgya'o/

52a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad par bsams la/ badz+ra satwa a a a aHzhes bya ba yang de bzhin du bzla bar bya'o// gal te sdig pa shin tu che bas de lta bus kyang 'bab par ma gyur na/ de'i tshe sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas 
52a8(rgyud 'grel): yang dang yang du sdig pa dral la/ yam shing dmar po rnams kyi me// rab spar rdo rje khro bo yi// mnyam par bzhag pas snyoms zhugs la// til ba sregs pas ni sdig bsregs shing // oM sarba pA 
52b1(rgyud 'grel): paM da ha na badz+rA ya swA hA/ zhes bya ba dang lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du til nag po las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan byas la/ hUM dbus su bsams pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bos sbyin sreg bya'o// 
52b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas sbyin sreg gi thab khung las byung ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje de'i lus las bab pas/ sdig pa rnams bsregs par gyur par bsams na/ nges par 'bab par 'gyur ro// 
52b3(rgyud 'grel): yang de lta bus kyang 'bab par ma gyur na/ de la dbang bskur bar mi bya'o// babs na skad cig ma de nyid la mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa rtogs par 'gyur ro// de nas babs par shes nas 
52b4(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon gyis kye rdo rje sems dpa'/ kye rdo rje rin chen/ kye rdo rje chos/ kye rdo rje las zhes bya bas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching du gzhug go// yang nr-i t+ya badz+ra zhes bya bas sems dpa'i gar bya'o// 
52b5(rgyud 'grel): gal te babs na dpal rdo rje semasad pa'i phyag rgya 'ching du bcug la/ de'i tshe slob dpon gyis rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan par bya'o// de bzhin du rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya 'ching du bcug la/ de'i tshe
52b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa'i bar du'o// de lta bus ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad dgongs par mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas 'dis mngon par 'dod pa thams cad bri bar bya ste/ 
52b7(rgyud 'grel): babs pa de'i lce la rdo rje bsams la/ 'bru hi badz+ra zhes brjod par bya ste/ de nas thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas pratIts+tsha badz+ra ho zhes bya bas phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor bar bya'o// de nas

54a1(rgyud 'grel): tog can la yi ge hUM bzlas pa dang / gos sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs la/ nam mkha'i mdzod yongs su bzlas te/ g.yon logs su bzhag la/ mchod yon byin nas/

54b1(rgyud 'grel): brten par mgon po bltams pa na// srid pa mthar phyin pa yi bkra shis gang byung ba'i// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas rgyal ba'i pho brang du// lhums nas bltams
